content.title: WISE Fellowship for Ph.D.
content.details: The 'WISE Fellowship for Ph.D. (WISE-PhD)' was started by the Department of Science and Technology under ‘Women in Science and Engineering-KIRAN (WISE-KIRAN)’ Scheme to provide an opportunity to carry out Doctoral research in basic and applied sciences to women scientists and technologists between the age group of 27-45 years who want to pursue research in STEM fields as a bench-level scientist.
benefits: The fellowship amount under this programme is ₹37,000/- per month along with House Rent Allowances (HRA) as per norms.
This Programme also provides a Research Grant of ₹1.00 lakh per year and Institutional overhead charges @₹ 0.50 lakh per year (as per DST norms).
eligibility: Unemployed women who want to pursue a Ph.D. can apply for a fellowship under WISE-PhD.
The applicant should have an M. Sc./ M. Tech. or equivalent degree like B. Tech., M.Phil., M. Pharm. etc. in basic and applied sciences from a recognized University/Institute.
The minimum age to apply for the programme is 27 years and the maximum is 45 years (A relaxation of 3 years in the upper age limit is allowed for SC/ ST/ PH candidates).
Women in regular employment are not eligible for WISE-PhD.
exclusions: Candidates who have completed two (2) years duration in Ph.D. as of the date of application are NOT eligible.
content.application_process: Online application process through the DST e-PMS Portal.
documents_required: Complete Proposal in Prescribed Proposal Format
SC/ ST/ PH Certificate (if claiming age relaxation)
Certificate from the Head of the Institution
Consent letter from Scientist Mentor cum Ph.D. Supervisor

faqs.question: Who is PI?
faqs.answer: Principal Investigator (PI) is the WISE-PhD Fellow, i.e., the applicant.

faqs.question: What is the last date for application submission?
faqs.answer: The portal is open throughout the year for proposal submission.

faqs.question: What is the age limit for WISE-PhD?
Is there any relaxation in the lower age limit?
faqs.answer: No, there is 3 years relaxation in the upper age limit for SC/ ST/ PH candidates.

faqs.question: I am not registered for Ph.D. Can I apply?
faqs.answer: Yes, subject to other eligibility criteria.

faqs.question: I am registered for Ph.D. and receiving a fellowship, am I still eligible to apply?
I have filled the application online. Do I need to fill the Proposal format provided in the Formats section also?
faqs.answer: Yes. The docx and pdf file of the offline proposal available in formats is to be mandatorily uploaded in the Submission section of the Online form.
